decks.notes: This deck utilizes a powerful control strategy focused on using Zur, Eternal Schemer to search for key cards and control the board with removal spells like Fatal Push and Vanishing Verse. The mana base is designed to support the deck's three-color requirements while also providing utility lands like Boseiju, Who Endures and Cavern of Souls. By efficiently controlling the game and using Zur's abilities to advantage, the deck aims to outvalue and outmaneuver opponents to secure victory in Pioneer 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck focuses on aggressive play with a Rakdos color combination, utilizing efficient creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm opponents. The deck includes powerful cards like Sheoldred, the Apocalypse and Blade of the Oni to close out games quickly. It also includes disruption spells like Duress and Thoughtseize to disrupt the opponent's game plan. The mana base is carefully crafted to support a fast and consistent aggressive strategy. With a mix of efficient removal, disruption, and powerful threats, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and win the game before the opponent can stabilize.
